subject: Football
Super Bowl
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: By making it to the Super Bowl with the New England Patriots, Jabar Gaffney has gone one giant step further than his father, Derrick, did in eight seasons as a receiver with the Jets.
snippet: By making it to the Super Bowl with the New England Patriots, Jabar Gaffney has gone one giant step further than his father, Derrick, did in eight seasons as a receiver with the Jets.
